body: In some situations, your movement may be so hampered that you don't have sufficient speed even to move 5 feet (a single square). In such a case, you may spend a full-round action to move 5 feet (1 square) in any direction, even diagonally. Even though this looks like a 5-foot step, it's not, and thus it provokes attacks of opportunity normally.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Actions In Combat/Full-Round Actions/Move 5 Feet through Difficult Terrain
name: Move 5 Feet through Difficult Terrain
